coreAttributes.name: latex catsuit
coreAttributes.description: This item of fetish clothing covers almost all of the wearer's body. The hands, feet, and head are left exposed, and thanks to a cut-out in the groin area, so are the wearer's genitals and asshole.

replacementText.self: With some effort and much stretching of latex, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to squeeze into the skin-tight catsuit.
replacementText.other: With some effort and much stretching of latex, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to squeeze [npc2.name] into the skin-tight catsuit.
replacementText.otherRough: With some effort and much stretching of latex, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to roughly force [npc2.name] into the skin-tight catsuit.

displacementText.self: Although it takes quite a lot of effort, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to pull off [npc.her] skin-tight latex catsuit.
displacementText.other: Although it takes quite a lot of effort, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to pull off [npc2.namePos] skin-tight latex catsuit.
displacementText.otherRough: Although it takes quite a lot of effort and force, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to pull off [npc2.namePos] skin-tight latex catsuit.
